text: hello I'm David Pogue happy holidays are
you at a loss to figure out GPS do you
practically need a map to figure them
out have you been looking for
information on the latest units well if
so you come to the right location enjoy
in the days of yesteryear GPS systems
were frustrating little machines there
were no touchscreens only buttons before
every trip you had to load him up with
maps from a set of cds and the hand
cranking got old fast okay i'm kidding
about the hand crank but gps really has
come a very long way for five or six
hundred bucks you can get one of these
top of the line units they've got some
really juicy features that the cheap
ones don't have like a built-in battery
so you can use it when you're biking or
hiking may also play music and pictures
and i love the way these things say the
street names they don't just say turn
right they actually say turn right on
Columbus Avenue all these units are also
hands-free Bluetooth speaker phones so
you can leave the cell phone in your
pocket oh excuse me I've got a call
coming in now hello hi honey it's me I
told you never to call me here I'm doing
a TV thing finally all of these units
can actually warned you about traffic
and accidents on your route and they'll
offer to divert you the service costs
about fifty bucks a year but it's worth
it all these units are amazing but i'll
show you my two favorites first of all
this is the garmin nuvi 684 the fifty
bucks a year you get not only the
traffic but also the local weather
report gas prices for all the gas
stations within your range and even get
this movie showtimes and this will even
guide me there my other favorite is this
tomtom 920 t check this out at any point
you can tap this help me button it will
give you either walking or driving
directions to things like the nearest
car repair the nearest hospital or my
personal favorite the nearer
dentist you know what else is cool on
the tomtom you don't have to type in the
address you want it to guide you to you
can just say it Stanford and finally the
tomtom lets you replace the little
computerized directional voice with your
own voice hours of fun for the whole
family turn right turn right for God's
sake turn right turn right for God's
sake as you can see today is GPS is far
more sophisticated than the GPS and the
days of old the only hard part is
choosing which one to get as for me I
opted for all of them
